pages.text: This link is not to a video, but to the offical Create discord server. On this discord server you can learn all kinds of information. It is a place to ask questions and help you troubleshoot your builds.
This is Create is the offical trailer video. I was blown away when I first saw this!

Rockit14 has a wonderful spotlight series featuring Create. His videos are very informative and to the point and don't waste a lot of time. His examples are easy to follow. I highly recommend watching this entire series.
Create: Get Started! Bit-by-Bit by Mischief of Mice! There are several more videos highlighting Create by Mischief of Mice
Monkey Farm also has some very good Create videos.
